summary: This is an email chain from September 13, 2019, between an FBI Special Agent in New York and a new ALAT (Assistant Legal Attaché) in Paris. The Paris-based official is reaching out to introduce themselves as a replacement and to discuss the Epstein case, requesting a brief call.

persons.name: SSA - FBI New York
persons.context: The recipient of an email from a new ALAT in Paris regarding the Epstein case, providing contact instructions.

events.title: Paris ALAT contacts FBI NY about Epstein case
events.description: A new Assistant Legal Attaché (ALAT) in Paris emails an FBI Special Agent in New York to introduce themselves as a replacement and request a brief call to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A new Assistant Legal Attaché (ALAT) was stationed in Paris as of September 2019, replacing a previous official.
The Paris ALAT initiated contact with an FBI Special Agent in New York specifically to discuss the Epstein case.
The communication indicates ongoing international coordination regarding the Epstein investigation in September 2019.
